title: Account suspended while the verified email has been changed
body: I was not in NA during the entire summer break, and I did not play a single league game during this time, but when I returned it is said that my account was permanent suspended, I did not receive any e-mail from Riot Game since January, so I checked my account setting and figured out my verified e-mail has been changed. Though my math history ended at 6/28, before I left Canada, and all my match history was completely fine （no intentional feeding or left the game, etc.）, so I am wondering that even if my account was hacked, the hacker didn't use it to play any game but changed y email address, so how did I get banned anyway. Is there anyway that I can fix my e-mail and recover my account from suspension? Pls help Riot Game.

replies.body: No worries bud! It does sound kind of strange, but let's go ahead and get you in touch with our account specialists through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to pick "I need help recovering my account" so you can send it without being signed in, and they'll be able to get everything straightened out after verifying you as the account creator.
Actually this is my account and I can log in on the website, just not the client. Thanks for replying.
